ygData.subject: Re: The Battle
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Astroblast notices the bot firing from way below (he is quite high), and laughs as several bullets dent his armour plating. He ignores the bot, He ll run

::Astroblast::
Astroblast notices the bot firing from way below (he is quite high), 
and laughs as several bullets dent his armour plating. He ignores 
the bot, "He'll run out of ammunition before he'll ever be able to take 
me down from up here." Astroblast fires three laser blasts from his 
twin lasers at the CF.

On 27 Feb 2001, at 6:15, airly2000@... wrote:

> Khonkolor:
> 
> "This is mine!!!!"thought the young bot. He took his machine gun and 
> shot 25 shots against Astroblast.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > ::Astroblast::
> > Over his comm-link, high above the CF, Astroblast commands 
> > Menasor, "MENASOR, DISBAND AND RETREAT, WE ARE OUT 
> > MANNED AND OUT GUNNED." As he monitors the actions below.
> > 
> > 
> > On 27 Feb 2001, at 0:27, Jen D. wrote:
> > 
> > > (hey! no one responded to the shots fired by the Element!:( )
> > > 
> > > Different shots heading for the electors hit the shields of the 
> Element, all 
> > > being destroyed. Looking around the battle, Mantle saw the other 
> Maximals 
> > > fighting. From the look of their base, things weren't good. He 
> looked down 
> > > at his team, sending a message to their minds:
> > > 
> > > "You guys go ahead, I'll battle from here." He looks up in time 
> to see a big 
> > > robot reaching for something that looked like a bunch of metal. 
> His mind 
> > > probed out, seeing that it was a robot. Mantle was a bit 
> surprised at all 
> > > the rage that he could feel around him, as well as the pain and 
> suffering, 
> > > but he was used to it by now. On his first several battles it 
> surprised him, 
> > > though, and made him a bit less good of a leader untill he got 
> used to it. 
> > > But he was used to it now, and no one was going to push the 
> Maximals around 
> > > while he was on this planet!
> > > 
> > > Mantle concentrated hard, making his mind reach out across the 
> battlefield. 
> > > He flexed his mind and Firearm's body rose from the shields, 
> avoiding 
> > > Menasor's grab. Mantle slowly lowered to the ground, his teeth 
> clenched. One 
> > > of the setbacks of his ability to use his mind to directly 
> influence robots 
> > > was that it created a temporary link between those robots and 
> himself. In 
> > > this case, Mantle could feel the pain that Firearm was feeling, 
> and it was 
> > > almost too much. But he held on, flipping Firearm through the air 
> with his 
> > > mind. Sweat poured down his forehead as he made Firearm's body 
> quickly fly 
> > > through the air toward the Element.
> > > 
> > > Through nearly closed eyes, Mantle could see the rest of his team 
> emerging 
> > > from the shield, still firing. He saw that Cinder was looking 
> through the 
> > > battle, searching for the bot she had been worrying about as she 
> fired more 
> > > at Deamon Wulf. His eyes drifted to the rest of his family, 
> seeing Rocky 
> > > fire two more missiles at Dark Claw. Aqua nearly tripped over the 
> uneven 
> > > ground, causing one of his spears to dig into the earth, but the 
> next three 
> > > were aimed exactly at Flesh Ripper's head. Above him, Mist gained 
> altitude, 
> > > firing charges at Menasor's hand.
